name: The Demon Lord Reincarnated as a Slave ~Rising to the Top to Rewrite History~
author: SHIRAISHI Shin
content: To fight the monstrous &quotOutsiders&quot invading from outer space, the world&#039s strongest Hero and Demon Lord joined forces. However, their alliance was ultimately defeated. In a desperate bid to change history, the Demon Lord, with the help of Hero&#039s secret technique to reverse time and undergo reincarnation.Reborn as a boy who was bullied and enslaved in noble society, the Demon Lord now faces a cruel new reality.&quotWhy is a slave so strong?!&quot &quotStrong? He’s not just strong—
